sqlMap.sql:
WHERE ESNTL_ID = #ESNTL_ID#
AND ACCML_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#FR_ACCML_DT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#TO_ACCML_DT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.99999
sqlMap.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ACCML_DT DESC) AS ROWSEQ , PURCHS_SN , CART_SN , POINT , ABS(POINT) POINT_ABS , DECODE(SIGN(POINT), 1, '적립', -1, '차감') POINT_DIV , (SELECT X.CODE_NM FROM TB_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE X WHERE X.CODE_ID = 'COM005' AND A.ACCML_SE = X.CODE) ACCML_SE_NM , ACCML_SE , TO_CHAR(ACCML_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ACCML_DT , VALID_DE , ESNTL_ID FROM TB_PURCHS_POINT A
